DOC.brief_summary: This randomise controlled trial compare antenatal preparation postnatal counseling strategy improve breastfeed rate . The objective : 1. study effect standard two-encounter postnatal lactation counsel protocol initiation maintenance exclusive breastfeediing mother 2. compare effect standard two-encounter postnatal lactation counsel protocol single-encounter antenatal breastfeed education protocol initiation maintenance exclusive breastfeeding mother .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomised Controlled Trial Compare Antenatal Preparation Postnatal Counseling
DOC.detailed_description: All pregnant mother wish breastfeed 34 week gestation , high risk pregnancy determine investigator multiple pregnancy current pregnancy give write informed consent randomise three group . Group 1 receive standard hospital care . Group 2 receive 1 session antenatal counseling Group 3 receive 2 session postanatal lactation counseling . All receive postnatal follow phone call use question Case Report Forms 2 week , 8 week , 3 month , 6 month 12 month . The mother contactable 3 consecutive month withdraw study .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman want breastfeed child 34 week gestation write informed consent give Pregnant woman high risk pregnancy determine investigator .
